nodes.name: UrbitToken

nodes.documentation: Only allowed to execute before the token sale is closed
nodes.name: beforeSaleClosed

nodes.documentation: Limiting functions to the admins of the token only
nodes.name: onlyAdmin

nodes.documentation: @dev allows the admin to assign a new admin
nodes.name: changeAdmin

nodes.documentation: @dev creates the tokens needed for sale
nodes.name: createSaleTokens

nodes.documentation: @dev Close the token sale
nodes.name: closeSale

nodes.documentation:
@dev Once the token sale is closed and tokens are distributed,
 burn the remaining unsold, undistributed tokens
nodes.name: burnUnsoldTokens

nodes.documentation: @dev Shorter version of vest tokens (lock for a single whole period)
nodes.name: lockTokens

nodes.documentation: @dev Vest tokens
nodes.name: vestTokens

nodes.documentation: @dev releases vested tokens for the caller's own address
nodes.name: releaseVestedTokens

nodes.documentation:
@dev releases vested tokens for the specified address.
 Can be called by any account for any address.
nodes.name: releaseVestedTokensFor

nodes.documentation: @dev returns whether the sender is admin (or the contract itself)
nodes.name: senderIsAdmin

nodes.documentation: @dev The sale is closed when the saleClosedTimestamp is set.
nodes.name: saleClosed

nodes.documentation: @dev check the locked balance for an address
nodes.name: lockedBalanceOf

nodes.documentation: @dev check the locked but releasable balance for an address
nodes.name: releasableBalanceOf

nodes.documentation: @dev get the number of TokenVesting contracts for an address
nodes.name: vestingCountOf

nodes.documentation: @dev get the specified TokenVesting contract address for an address
nodes.name: vestingOf

nodes.documentation: @dev Trading is limited before the sale is closed
nodes.name: transferFrom

nodes.documentation: @dev Trading is limited before the sale is closed
nodes.name: transfer

nodes.documentation: @dev Grant tokens which begin vesting upon close of sale.
nodes.name: _presaleLock

nodes.documentation: @dev Create a TokenVault and fill with the specified newly minted tokens
nodes.name: createTokenVault

nodes.documentation: @dev Creates the tokens awarded after the sale is closed
nodes.name: createAwardTokens
